item.title: Learning DaVinci Resolve
item.description: DaVinci Resolve is the current popular and trending video editing software. In this post I will share the resources for learning DaVinci. YouTube Videos Link Description HOW TO Locked On Stabilization Effect Tracking the subject and making the video look stable How To Remove In and Out Markers Remove the marker How to Reframe Footage in DaVinci Resolve 2024 Guide Reframing the footage How to use Ripple Editing in Resolve to edit faster Using ripple editing Edit Faster with Stacked Timelines in DaVinci Resolve 18 Stacked timeline How to Create a Zoom and Position Transition Zooming and position changing Keyboard Shortcuts Key Functions Ctrl + Shift + [ or ] For trimming forward and backward, Alternatively select Trim edit mode instead of selection mode - Link
